documentation.text:
@dev Delegated Farming Contract.
Implements a conditoin on the DFT-DFT farming pool for users to generate more rewards

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "msg.sender is not allowed to operate Pool"

arguments.value: msg.sender is not allowed to operate Pool

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "msg.sender is not allowed to operate Pool"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "User stake% share too high. Leave some for the smaller guys ;-)"

arguments.value: User stake% share too high. Leave some for the smaller guys ;-)

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "User stake% share too high. Leave some for the smaller guys ;-)"

documentation.text:
@dev Function gets the amount of DFT in the DFT dungeon farm 
to calculate a score that boosts the StakingRewards calculation
DFT requirements to get a boost are hard coded into the contract
0DFT to 100 DFT staked respectfully generate a 0% to 100% bonus on Staking.
returned is a number between 50 and 100

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address) view external returns (string memory,string memory,uint8,uint256,bool,uint8)
literal_string "cannot remove a token with existing stake"

arguments.value: cannot remove a token with existing stake

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "cannot remove a token with existing stake"
